title: F*ck you Riot
body: I lose 10 games in a rolls just because of those f*cking noobs, can you just f*cking kick them or something, and f*ck you stupid meta, F*ck this game.****

replies.body: 5 games in a row, including the one you AFKed, and three where you barely contributed outside what looks like securing kills.

Can't blame you for being upset over losing consecutive games. It's absolutely infuriating to work on a streak, only to lose the Same amount of games afterwards. Happens, nothing you can really do about it except either rethink your strategy OR take a break & come back later. I've taken a break from Flex 3v3 twice already because of the frustration.
